sentences.en: ‘Somewhere,’ he mused, ‘I’ve heard your name before.’
sentences.cn: “我以前在哪里，”他沉思着说，“听说过你的名字。”

sentences.en: Hatch set off to make rounds, leaving Dick in a muse.
sentences.cn: 哈奇说着就巡逻去了, 留下狄克沉浸在深思中.

sentences.en: He mused on how different his life would have been, had he not met Louisa.
sentences.cn: 他默默地想，如果没有遇到路易莎，他的人生会有多么不同。

sentences.en: Her death inspired him , and she led him to art as Muse.
sentences.cn: 她就像缪斯, 引领着乔治驶向艺术的彼岸.

sentences.en: His muse had deserted him, and he could no longer write.
sentences.cn: 他已无灵感, 不能再写作了.

sentences.en: However difficult she might have been, this book exalts her as both mother and muse.
sentences.cn: 尽管她可能很难相处，这本书还是对她给予了高度赞扬，称她既是母亲又是诗人。

sentences.en: I like to muse about what I will do when I grow up.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢仔细思考长大后做什么.

sentences.en: I muse later it is possibly the way her parents teach.
sentences.cn: 后来,我想到这可能是她父母的教育方式.

sentences.en: I want to be a better writer and maybe my muse will provide the motivation.
sentences.cn: 我希望成为一名更好的作者，也许我的沉思将为我提供动力。

sentences.en: I will meditate on all Your work And muse on Your deeds.
sentences.cn: 诗77:12我也要思想你的经营、默念你的作为.

sentences.en: Initially it will be really hard to ignore the mind that wants to plan for the future and muse about the past, but with time you will see through its insanity.
sentences.cn: 开始时，忽视想要计划将来沉思过去的思想是很困难的，但是随着时间的推移，你将看穿它的荒谬。

sentences.en: It is useless to muse on [ upon ] past errors .
sentences.cn: 一味想着 已往 的过失是没用的.

sentences.en: Many of the papers muse on the fate of the President.
sentences.cn: 很多报纸都在揣测总统的命运。

sentences.en: Muse, thy promise now fulfil!
sentences.cn: 缪斯, 把你的诺言履行!

sentences.en: Not physiognomy alone nor brain alone is worthy for the Muse.
sentences.cn: 我说,值得歌唱的不仅仅是相貌和头脑.

sentences.en: Once she was a nude model and muse to French artist Henri Matisse.
sentences.cn: 她曾是法国画家亨利·马蒂斯的人体模特和灵感女神。

sentences.en: She muse have been beautiful and is still well - looked.
sentences.cn: 她以前想必很美,现在仍然很好看.

sentences.en: The muse does not inspire all poets equally.
sentences.cn: 诗神并不一视同仁地赐给所有诗人灵感.

sentences.en: The sloth-like times come when we lose touch with our inner muse.
sentences.cn: 当我们与内心沉思失去联系的时候，懒惰就会出现。

sentences.en: Therefore, there muse be many areas of development and opportunities for innovation.
sentences.cn: 因此, 在水平营销领域中还存在很多发展和创新的机会.

trans.tran_en: someone’s muse is the force or person that makes them want to write, paint, or make music, and helps them to have good ideas
to think about something for a long time
